Interface iGSONOperations

All Known Implementing Classes:
GSONTools
public interface iGSONOperations
Interface with methods to handle JSON-functionalities, e.g., serialization.
Author:
janii

    Method
    Description
    Object
    convertJSONToObjects(String JSONString, Class<?> targetClass)
    Converts a JSON string to an object of the specified class.
    <T> T
    convertJSONToObjects(String JSONString, Type type)
    Converts a JSON string to an object of the specified type.

  • Method Details

    • convertJSONToObjects

      Object convertJSONToObjects(String JSONString, Class<?> targetClass) throws com.google.gson.JsonParseException
      Converts a JSON string to an object of the specified class.
      Parameters:
      JSONString - the JSON string to convert
      targetClass - the class of the object to convert to
      Returns:
      the converted object
      Throws:
      com.google.gson.JsonParseException - if the JSON is not valid or cannot be converted

    • convertJSONToObjects

      <T> T convertJSONToObjects(String JSONString, Type type) throws com.google.gson.JsonParseException
      Converts a JSON string to an object of the specified type. This method is useful for converting JSON to a list of objects.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the object to convert to
      Parameters:
      JSONString - the JSON string to convert
      type - the type of the object to convert to
      Returns:
      the converted object
      Throws:
      com.google.gson.JsonParseException - if the JSON is not valid or cannot be converted
